entities: Government of National Unity and Transition
summary:
9. The Governments of Uganda, Rwanda, and the Democratic Republic of the Congo are demanded to stop using their territories to support violations of the arms embargo or activities of armed groups.

10. Neighboring states are urged to prevent support to the illegal exploitation of Congolese natural resources.

11. The Secretary-General is requested to ensure compliance with the zero-tolerance policy on sexual exploitation and abuse by UN personnel.

12. Troop-contributing countries are urged to take action to prevent sexual exploitation and abuse by their personnel.

13. The Council decides to remain actively seized of the matter.
